entries.topic: ER Diagram Notations (Chen, Crow's Foot, UML)
CREATE TABLE and ALTER TABLE Statements
Constraint Definitions (PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, UNIQUE, CHECK)
JOIN Types (INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL OUTER, CROSS)
EXISTS, IN, ANY, and ALL Operators
Common Table Expressions (CTEs) and WITH Clause
Aggregate Functions (COUNT, SUM, AVG, MIN, MAX)
Control Flow Statements (IF, CASE, LOOP, WHILE)
Approximate Numeric Types (FLOAT, REAL, DOUBLE PRECISION)
TIME and TIME WITH TIME ZONE
TIMESTAMP and TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE
Data Dictionary and System Catalog Storage
Transaction States (Active, Partially Committed, Committed, Failed, Aborted)
Deadlock Conditions (Mutual Exclusion, Hold and Wait, No Preemption, Circular Wait)
Read Phase, Validation Phase, Write Phase
ARIES (Algorithm for Recovery and Isolation Exploiting Semantics)
Recovery Time Objective (RTO) and Recovery Point Objective (RPO)
Syntax Analysis and Parse Tree Generation
Join Operations (Natural Join, Theta Join, Equi-Join)
Left-Deep, Right-Deep, and Bushy Join Trees
Statistics Collection and Maintenance (ANALYZE, UPDATE STATISTICS)
BASE Properties (Basically Available, Soft state, Eventually consistent)
